custom_soft.title: Custom Software
custom_soft.subtitle: We develop customized solutions according to your needs and process automation.

features.title: Software that helps your operational processes

1.title: Custom Analysis and Design
1.description: We develop specific solutions for your business, adapted to your unique processes and needs.

2.title: Integration with Existing Systems
2.description: We connect your new software with your current systems, ensuring a smooth transition and efficient data flow.

3.title: Agile and Scalable Development
3.description: We use agile methodologies to deliver quick results and build systems that grow with your business.

4.title: Intuitive Interface
4.description: We design easy-to-use interfaces that improve productivity and reduce the learning curve.

5.title: Support and Maintenance
5.description: We provide continuous support and updates to keep your software running optimally.

6.title: Built-in Security
6.description: We implement security best practices to protect your data and comply with regulations.

1.question: How long does it take to develop custom software?
1.answer: Development time varies depending on project complexity. Typically, a small project can take 2 to 3 months, while more complex projects can extend from 6 months to 1 year.

2.question: What methodology do you use for development?
2.answer: We use agile methodologies like Scrum, which allows us to deliver results iteratively and maintain constant communication with the client throughout the development process.

3.question: Do you include maintenance and support after development?
3.answer: Yes, we offer post-development maintenance and support services to ensure your software works correctly and stays updated.

4.question: What technologies do you use for development?
4.answer: We use the most current and appropriate technologies for each specific project, including languages like Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern frameworks according to project requirements.

transcripcion.title: Transcription System
transcripcion.subtitle: Convert audio to text with high accuracy and speed.

1.title: Real-time transcription
1.description: Convert audio to text instantly during calls, meetings, or live recordings.

2.title: Queue processing
2.description: Transcribe multiple audio files simultaneously by adding them to a processing queue.

3.title: Multiple formats supported
3.description: Compatible with various audio formats such as MP3, WAV, M4A, and more.

4.title: Speaker identification
4.description: Distinguishes between different voices in a conversation for clearer and organized transcription.

1.question: What languages does the transcription system support?
1.answer: Our system primarily supports English and Spanish. Other languages are available upon request.

2.question: What is the accuracy of the transcriptions?
2.answer: Typical accuracy is over 95% in optimal audio conditions. Quality may vary depending on audio clarity, background noise, and speaker accent.

3.question: How are transcription results delivered?
3.answer: Transcriptions are delivered in various formats such as TXT, PDF, or custom formats, with options for timestamps and speaker labeling.

5.question: Does the system work offline?
5.answer: We offer both cloud solutions and local deployment options for offline environments, depending on security and privacy requirements.

voiceprint.title: Voice Recognition System
voiceprint.subtitle: Identify and verify speakers by their voice.

1.title: Voice biometric authentication
1.description: Verify user identity through their unique voiceprint with high accuracy and security.

2.title: Live voice detection
2.description: Identify and verify voices in real-time during calls or live conversations.

3.title: Advanced anti-spoofing
3.description: Detect impersonation attempts and recordings, ensuring voice authenticity.

4.title: Multichannel integration
4.description: Compatible with different communication channels such as phone, mobile apps, and web systems.

1.question: How secure is voice recognition?
1.answer: Our system uses advanced biometric technology with over 99% accuracy and protection against impersonation attempts.

2.question: How long does it take to register a voiceprint?
2.answer: The registration process typically takes less than 30 seconds, requiring the user to read a brief calibration phrase.

3.question: Does it work with any language?
3.answer: The system is language-independent and works with any language, as it relies on unique biometric voice characteristics.

4.question: What happens if someone's voice changes due to illness?
4.answer: The system accounts for natural voice variations and can adapt to temporary changes. In cases of significant changes, the voice profile can be updated.

5.question: How does it integrate with existing systems?
5.answer: We offer APIs for integration with existing authentication systems, call centers, and custom applications.

6.question: Where are voiceprints stored?
6.answer: Voiceprints are stored securely and encrypted, either in the cloud or on local servers, complying with privacy and security standards.

agents.title: AI Agents
agents.subtitle: AI agents to perform specific tasks and automate processes.

1.title: Customer Support
1.description: Specialized agent for resolving product inquiries, complaints, and specialized service questions.

2.title: Meeting Scheduling Agent
2.description: Specialized agent for booking, confirming, rescheduling, or canceling appointments while providing excellent customer service.

1.question: What is the service cost?
1.answer: The cost varies depending on implementation; a regular cost would be approximately 3,500 MXN. This is just the agent development cost.

2.question: Where is the agent hosted?
2.answer: The agent can be hosted in the cloud or in your own infrastructure; in some cases, agents will require API consumption.

3.question: What types of tasks can AI agents perform?
3.answer: Agents can perform various tasks such as customer service, appointment scheduling, answering frequent queries, processing basic requests, and automating repetitive processes.

4.question: What languages can the agents operate in?
4.answer: Our agents can be configured to operate in multiple languages, with English and Spanish being the main ones, with the possibility to expand to other languages as needed.

5.question: What level of customization do you offer for agents?
5.answer: Agents can be completely customized according to your needs, including communication tone, industry-specific knowledge, and particular workflows.

6.question: How do agents integrate with existing systems?
6.answer: Agents can integrate with your current systems through APIs, webhooks, and custom connectors, allowing smooth communication with your existing tools.

automatization.title: AI Automation
automatization.subtitle: Automate tasks and processes with intelligent agents.

1.title: Process Automation
1.description: Automate your agency's processes and save time and money.

1.question: What types of processes can be automated?
1.answer: Various processes can be automated such as document management, approval workflows, data processing, report generation, task tracking, and routine communications.

2.question: How long does it take to implement automation?
2.answer: Implementation time varies depending on process complexity, typically from 2 weeks for simple automations to 2-3 months for more complex processes.

3.question: What benefits can I expect from automation?
3.answer: Benefits include reduction of human errors, time savings, increased operational efficiency, cost reduction, and better process tracking.

4.question: Is technical knowledge required to use the automations?
4.answer: No, automations are designed to be easy to use. We provide training and support so your team can operate them without advanced technical knowledge.

5.question: Can automations be modified after implementation?
5.answer: Yes, automations are flexible and can be adjusted as your needs or business processes change.
